review: Absolutely loved the bounce and the professional surface. Played a solid 2 hours!
Nice wood flooring and great shuttle response. A bit humid but manageable.
Bowling machine worked like a charm. Ideal net practice session!
Red clay surface feels authentic! Slightly dusty but worth it.
Turf was clean, goals sturdy, and the match vibe was electric under floodlights!
The flooring was okay, but ventilation could be better. Friendly staff though.
This is my go-to court! Consistent bounce and comfy shaded seating.
Big field, decent turf, scoreboard was useful. Needs ball collection service.
Loved playing indoor! Warm seating and quality synthetic grass.
Feels like Wimbledon! The surface was lush and freshly cut.
Ball machine was helpful for drills. Lighting could be a bit brighter at night.
Impressed with the court quality. Air conditioning made a big difference.
Machines worked fine, but the net needed minor fixing.
Amazing turf! Had a thrilling 5-a-side match here with friends.
Smooth court. Best for aggressive baseliners like me!
Coaching session was top-notch. Excellent value for money.
Loved the setup, but one goalpost net was loose. Still had fun!
Good experience overall. Soft mat was knee-friendly.
Playing here felt like Roland-Garros. Sunset view was breathtaking!
Great grass texture. A little slippery after rain though.
